sentences.sContent: Do women deserve their reputation for cattiness and backbiting?
sentences.sContent_eng: Do women deserve their reputation for cattiness and backbiting?
sentences.sCn: 这样的阴险和中伤朋友是否对得起自己的地位？

trans.tranOther: If you accuse someone of backbiting, you mean that they say unpleasant or unkind things about someone who is not present, especially in order to stop them from doing well at work
